what_you_do: Darren Cherry is an industry-leading Exit Strategist that has helped entrepreneurs put a combined $50 million more in their pockets at their exit.
social_proof: Darren has been a driving force in over 40 business acquisitions, divestments and integrations. He holds certification and designations from the Exit Planning Institute [Certified Exit Planning Advisor], Value Builder Group [Certified Value Builder], Corporate Value Metrics [Corporate Value Growth Advisor], and the Work Coaching Institute [Certified Coach].
business_focus: To help serious business owners generate more clients and put more money in their pockets at their exit.
service_provided: Exit strategy, business acquisitions, divestments, integrations
